ygData.subject: Re: From eq.stratics.com
ygData.msgSnippet: I JUST killed meldrath today with one of my characters.. he was lvl 35. (note: he used to be 25-30 but they have upped him a bit) ... From: Michael Ott
ygData.messageBody:
I JUST killed meldrath today with one of my characters.. he was lvl 35.
(note: he used to be 25-30 but they have upped him a bit)
----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 8:14 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] From eq.stratics.com


> From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
>
> anyone know what lev meldrath is?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jbuckingham@... [mailto:jbuckingham@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 5:35 PM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] From eq.stratics.com
>
>
> From: jbuckingham@...
>
>
>
>
> <Disclaimer: This is not my information, I just copied and pasted a post
> from
> the above site's message boards>
>
> The message subject was "Just made a collapsible fishing pole" or some
> such..
>
> "
>
>
> Not gonna spoil it for ye all though, ye gotta kill Meldrath for the
> recipes.
>
>
>
> "
>
> Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components for
the
> new
> ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
> So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become
> apparent,
> as all those rangers go gunning for him :)
>
>
> **********************************************************************
> This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and
> intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they
> are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify
> the system manager.
>

>
> www.mimesweeper.com
